Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2014 11:47PM Liz15 wrote: I just wanted to say thank you to the original poster and to those who've commented. I know I'm way late on this post, but I was just told I should get surgery to remove my fibroadenomas; I've only had one other surgery in my life so I'm terrified about it. However, y'all's posts have given me so much peace and I just wanted y'all to know that. Ready to get these nasty things out, and now I'm not so scared to! Thanks again!!
Posts.Title: Fibroadenoma Removal Surgery? Candro Moderators
